website_summaries.verdict: Though not as versatile as some of its competitors, it has a lot going for it: cute look, quality material, and low price.
pros: Attractive knit pattern and bright color
Made of acrylic that has a well-made feel
Comes in 3 sizes, and fits dogs with chests up to 22 inches
Washes nicely when instructions are followed
cons: Not ideal for very large breeds
Requires cold-water wash and line drying

customer_reviews.title: Cute turtleneck sweater for my pup
customer_reviews.text: Size 10"/small fits my 7-pound Yorkie with a 13" chest perfectly. The sleeves don't stay folded up... I thought about sewing them but prefer them unfolded, even though that makes the inseam visible. The sweater has held up well after multiple washings, but I do turn it inside out and place it in a mesh bag before putting it in the washer. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jet Set Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, soft sweather. I have a terrier mix, 17 lbs., chest 20.5" and neck 12" - the Size 14 worked well. The turtleneck part was a tad bit large so I had to fold it down twice, but the rest fit like a glove! Love the little sleeves folded up one - darling!
customer_reviews.author: M. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Got the olive green in the XSmall. He's 3.6 pounds and it fits him with a little room to grow. Big selling points were the sleeves and the color. Getting ready for the cool months. Want it to fit but be able to add his coat on colder days. Hate guessing but when I have to add something to get the free shipping I order something I need. Using an educated guess, hopefully educated enough.
customer_reviews.author: STAR STRUCKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome sweater for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy sweater perfect for chilly days and nights. It looks adorable on my 9 lbs long haired Chi. I ordered a size 10. She wears it under her winter coat on walks. The turtle neck has a calming effect on her when worn indoors much like wearing a certain jacket to soothe frayed nerves.
customer_reviews.author: Blksquirrel419

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blue one first and was so happy with the fit and quality of the sweater, I came back for the dark olive. The blue one is made with thicker, more sturdy yarn. I have found the green one to be not quite as nice in the yarn itself. The blue holds it shape so nicely, the green stretches out almost immediately and is "floppy". The workmanship on both sweaters is very nice however. The blue is nicer quality yarn, sometimes yarn, the same yarn, with different dyes can react in different ways; maybe the darker colors effect the material more? Don't know. I am still quite happy with both sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieL

customer_reviews.title: Stinky G Turtle Neck Dog Sweater
customer_reviews.text: This dog sweater is so cute! I found the sizing chart to be extremely accurate, and the fabric is soft and somewhat stretchy. The size #12 fits my pure bred rat terrier perfectly. I got the color mint and it is bright like the description photo, but I don't like using the camera flash on my dog's eyes so it looks darker in my photo. I would definitely order more Stinky G brand sweaters for her again. This sweater does have a leash hole and is thick enough to keep her warm outside during late fall or early spring, but not warm enough for the middle of winter (at least not here in Wisconsin).
customer_reviews.author: Telee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little guy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5lb male Chihuahua and have a hard time finding sweaters that fit. I used the measurement guidelines given in the item description, and according to those I needed to order a size #08 ... PERFECT! I'm so happy with this sweater! In the photos Chico Bob looks a little distressed because of the sleeves, but he'll get used to them. ;) He does not mind wearing shirts and in fact prefers to, however I've never been able to find him one with sleeves that fits. Now if only they had more colors available for males in this size! :) :) No complaints (other than wishing for more colors). Soft, warm, seems comfortable, and good quality. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: "Miss In-between"
customer_reviews.text: My pup is 9.5# and in-between size small/medium. I opted for medium just in case she grows more. The sleeves are long for her but it was simple to fold them up and tack them. I think this sweater will last a long time; and with cold temperatures ahead should be perfect to provide her warmth. Subsequently ordered another for daughter's little pet. They are both so "stinking" cute! Particularly nice that they cover the whole back of our pups and a good part of tummies without dragging on the ground. Thinking of ordering another color. These are adorable and functional. Win/win.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Would Definitely Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute sweater! I ordered 2 of them for shih tzu. He was cold after going to the groomer which is why I purchased. My shih tzu is very afraid of thunderstorms & the sweater even seemed to help comfort him during the thunder & lightning. Such a great value & super precious. Would order again for sure. Dog is 12-14 pounds & the size 12 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Greatest sweater ever
customer_reviews.text: The measurements given in order to choose a size actually WORKED. I ordered a size M for my shih tzu and it is a TEENSY bit big but much better than the other size M sweaters I've ordered that fit like bare-midriff mini-shirts. The cute front sleeves keep the snow off his arms (a problem with a little furry dog who finds an 8" snowfall an almost insurmountable burden) and the underside is waist-length, so he can pee without getting his sweater all yucky. I will buy this brand again. Minor critique: the turtleneck could be a little shorter. It comes to my dog's ears.
customer_reviews.author: SusanJ

customer_reviews.title: The best dog sweater!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Millennium Pink sweater in size #14 for our 19lb. Shiba and it fits perfectly! She has a masculine look even though she's our little girl, and this coral pink color makes her look so pretty and comfy... We've bought other sweaters before but never had a good fit as most of these sweaters are made for tiny dogs, but we are so glad this was such a great fit. I'm thinking of getting another one with the open collar in the same color, and hope they come out with more in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: gemma

customer_reviews.title: Good looking!
customer_reviews.text: The large fit my 35 lbs tall poodle mix, the medium fit my thick 20 lbs terrier mix. I never used the collar down just to get more coverage on the back end on very cold winter mornings. They didn't like the thickness of the turtleneck part anyway.
customer_reviews.author: E. E. SuranieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect and best sweater EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a knit turtleneck sweater for my “slightly” overweight 7-8 lb Chihuahua because they stretch. I found this and it was EXACTLY what I was looking for! I ordered a size 10/S and it fit great. However, the turtleneck is perfect for outdoors, but when she’s sleeping it’s a little restrictive on her neck and sometimes her arms slip out of it and it gets stuck around her belly lol. But I like that it’s not too snug when she sleeps, doesn’t rub in her armpits when she walks, is a beautiful blush rose (more so than my pictures) and is good quality and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this sweater for my girl. I measured her to make sure I got the right size and it fits her perfectly. The best parts about it is that #1 it's very thick and feels like good quality #2 it's true to color and looks exactly like the picture. I would definitely buy again. This is probably my most favorite thing I've bought my girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most adorable sweater in the dog world
customer_reviews.text: The most adorable sweater in the dog world! Our puppy is comfortable wearing it. She gets compliments wherever she goes when she has it on. We had a smaller size when she was a tiny puppy and glad to know that the quality remains consistent. The olive green color is great. Thanks for making such a high quality sweater. We hand wash and line dry and it comes out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mcicalese

customer_reviews.title: Best dog sweater!
customer_reviews.text: My poor little dog was groomed the week before the coldest weather of the winter. She had no fur left & needed some sweaters. I bought two Stinky G sweaters because of the long front sleeves and the style. These are very well made, they cover her belly area better than others and the fixing was actually correct. I wanted them to cover from neck to her tail and they do! THANK YOU STINKY G!!! Great name btw!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very cute sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Again, I am very pleased with this sweater as well. The material is very soft and the color is exactly as the picture shows. I bought the size 10 in this one as well and it fits my 7lb Chihuahua Tucker perfectly. I would have given this one 5 stars too, but there's a small place on one of the sleeves where the stitching has unraveled a little. I can repair it myself, so there's no need in returning it, it's just a little disappointing to have to do a repair on something straight out of the packaging. I'd love to have more of these in different colors - he's as cute as can be in it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Pink turtleneck sweater fits great
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what size to order for my little shih Tzu, the size 12 was just right. She weighs about 12 lb so that gives you some idea
customer_reviews.author: aceebee

customer_reviews.title: Well made, warm, true to size
customer_reviews.text: My shih tzu mix is 14 lbs with a barrel chest (16"). The #12 is a perfect fit. I was worried the turtleneck would ride too high or be uncomfortable for her, but it's fine. Covers enough of her legs, plenty of room to pee. I might use this for pajamas this winter as she kicks her blankey off;)
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size at all
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is of great material, it feels pricey.... I ordered the small for my jack-a-poo, I swear it's really a large, she cannot wear it at all. It's huge. I love the pink color I ordered, the quality, and so disappointed it doesn't fit. I don't bother with returns, so its a loss for me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy M

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sweater for my 4 and a half pound Yorkie, in size small, and it fits beautifully. The quality is top notch, and the color is gorgeous. This is his first bit of clothing and he had no problem with having it on; no embarrassment or thinking he was in trouble, no rolling around trying to get it off. After summer is past this will be awesome for helping him stay warm in my chilly apartment. .
customer_reviews.author: luckytroll

customer_reviews.title: CUTE CUTE CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is ADORABLE!!! The color is more of a coral pink than a true pink--and I love this coral shade! The M fits my 6-month Cavalier King Charles Spaniel perfectly (I think she's about 11-12 pounds). It's so, so cute on her and I've ordered 3 more in different colors. The price point is great, too. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SaladEatingCat

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute! !
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Size small fits my 7.5 pound Yorkie pretty well, just fits shorter on his back than the dog shown in the picture. My lil guy does have a longer back than most Yorkies I've seen (about 13 inches) and longer hair, show a medium probably would fit his back side better, but the small works. He does looks adorable in the sweater! The leash hole is a major plus!! Also, in certain lighting the sweater looks slightly more greenish then shown on the website.

customer_reviews.title: My teacup yorkie poo loves these sweaters
customer_reviews.text: Okay I just have to post this :-) this sweater, her spring sweater is just way too cute ;-) we bought the dark purple at the beginning of winter and she loves that one also. I have tried three or four other brands she will have nothing to do with them but these she loves 🐕💜 she is a 4 lb teacup yorkie poo and the extra small is perfect for her
customer_reviews.author: lyndoemom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This lil sweater is so well made it fits our lil Yorkie who weighs 10 pds perfect. I have washed it twice now n it retains its size, shape and color. I will buy more in the future for sure. Btw I have bought many sweaters for him n this by far is top of the line being I have paid way more for others that are already in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dont Tread on Me

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well-made, color was off
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, well made and well fitting. Unfortunately, the color didn't match. I got the deep purple, which turned out to be a pale lilac color, so I returned it, planning to get the red. By the time I turned my attention back to the page, the red was sold out I'm looking forward to seeing it available again
customer_reviews.author: Q-New

customer_reviews.title: A cute turtleneck for my Chi
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty easy to put on, turtleneck and sleeves. It is good for chilly winter days in the house but not warm enough for the really cold New England Winter potty breaks. Wind and cold will go through the knit to her skin easily. It would work for chilly Spring and Fall days in the 50's/60's. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Miat1of5

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Luna is a 4.8 lb mini aussidoodle. Her neck is 10", chest is 12", and back length is 12". She's wearing the size #8. I gave her a bad haircut and she's been shivering. This is perfect for her! And she looks too darn cute! It's a little short for her long body, but it's still adorable. The collar hole is a little far back, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: The length is short but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for small dogs like Chihuahua.The only complaints I have is the need to make the length longer but keep the neck and chest the same. If back length was 2 inches longer it would fit perfect . I bought a size 8. My Chi is for 4 months and 5 lbs . I think a size 10 would be better in length but to big every where else.
customer_reviews.author: christi lucero

customer_reviews.title: Medium Fits Rolex, Love It...
customer_reviews.text: Rolex is a 14 1/2 lb Senior Miniature Poodle. 18 1/2" chest circumference. 12" neck circumference 14 1/2" neck-base to tail-base length. Fits loose, he loves it loose. I may send picture later..... Don't like the hole for leash. It Gapes Open. I will sew it shut with yarn.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute got it for my dashound.. soft and warm..
customer_reviews.author: Mrswright1982

customer_reviews.title: Love these sweaters!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these sweaters! The #10 S fits my 8.5 chiwestie perfectly. She loves wearing these and they look so adorable on her. I washed one in cold water and it did shrink up even without putting in the dryer so I would suggest maybe hand washing when necessary. I personally think the turtlenecks are the cutest! The price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jess

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 10 for our senior cat that weighs about 6 pounds. As she recovers from health issues she needs extra layers until her weight is back up. The arms are a bit long, but we folded then to make it more comfortable. The neck fits just fine and it does not constrain any movement. Body is loose fitting. Every cat is different, but she doesn't seem bothered when it's on. Material isn't super soft, it's a harder cable knit.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my fur baby, he loves to nibble at it, however the quality is pretty good, so it doesn’t damage easily. The bottom part has an opening which I’m not too fond of, but overall it’s very adorable! The colors are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Taea Jhingoree

customer_reviews.title: The material is super stiff and wont soften in laundry, bought all color's,  pups dont like them
customer_reviews.text: These are well made but they are seriously stiff! I've washed them but nothing is comfortable about these. I have 2 maltese, 11.5 mths and 4 mths. They dont like wearing them and i bought 1or 2 in every color. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: LittleMoosieandWillowsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit----But Chi Still Manages to Get It Off
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to finally find a sweater that fits my Chi; however, she was still able to get it off all be herself during the night while I slept. For a dog that shakes a lot this was a real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Evolvingelder

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Measure your dog and order from their size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with Quality of knit. Definitely pay attention and measure your dog. Their Size chart is accurate to measurement of your dog. I love the colors and I love the style and thickness of this sweater. I want one too!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 14 for my 15lb pug, surprisingly the turtleneck version does fit her! I think in the future I will stick to the v neck version though as it works better with all of her neck rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this for my Yorkie!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sweater. My Yorkie is 9lbs and this fits him very well and is extremely soft. I am very picky and always on the lookout for good quality sweaters as he is always cold - this one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: We all love them. Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bruce loves it! He wears it in AK so far all November. And he usually wants coats to get off of him right away because they itch. This one is a little big but he doesn't like tight garments. Lilly loves hers too. So does Joe, but theirs is same different style.
customer_reviews.author: Collegeeducated

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie has every color so you know I think they are the best . They are made well and so easy to get on and off. I wash and dry they with other laundry and they come out soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of this company's sweaters for my dog and they are really cute and high quality. This one seems a little bigger than the others I have bought in this size but I still love, it's comfy for my pet and I think their pricing is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bucher

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater
customer_reviews.text: My girl pug looks so cute in this sweater! It keeps her warm and cozy when we head outside. I ordered it a bit too large for her size. I got the 14 and it is too long on her back but I sewed it up to fit her better. It's been washed a couple of times and is still in great shape. I love the long sleeves on her front legs!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa K. Irish

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: This just felt a little cheap quality-wise to me. I guess I should’ve expected that more, the tan color wasn’t quite what I wanted it to be and the yarn was so-so and polyester feeling. All around average product but I sent it back. Size small fit my terrier mix, for reference she’s Jack Russell sized in height and body length but slimmer
customer_reviews.author: ZS

customer_reviews.title: Nice sweater
customer_reviews.text: Sweater quality is great, very soft, love the bright colors, just not small enough for our 2 lb. puppy. His siblings can wear it. Hard time finding XXS size clothes, most of the time we use a cut to size sock and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice quality, well made sweater
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality, well made sweater. I bought the large size for my 26 pound Bichon/Poodle mix and it fits her very well. Most sizing charts say she should wear a medium, but after trying a few medium sweaters, I realized that it isn't just a brand issue. At least with the curly hair of my dog, the medium was just too tight, but it was also too short. She likes her new sweater and seems comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary & Constance Geick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colour true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy she warm sweater. Fits my 2.5 pound Yorkie perfect. Size 08 purchased. The purple is a beautiful colour true to picture. The sweater has enough stretch to fit her when she is full grown. :-)
customer_reviews.author: little_missyk Canada

customer_reviews.title: Quality sweater
customer_reviews.text: Great little sweater for my 11.8lbs schnoodle. She loves it! It’s easy to put on and take off, it’s a nice purple and comfortable. I’m considering buying another color for her.
customer_reviews.author: MH2

customer_reviews.title: I have a 5 lb Yorkie who love his sweaters the moment it gets a little cool
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 lb Yorkie who love his sweaters the moment it gets a little cool. He is very picky and has his favorites. I bought tow of these in different colors & as soon as the arrived, he was carrying one around all day. I put it on him and he was very happy. The next day I put on the other one & he was not as happy so I quickly washed both of them together & now he likes both of them equally. They fit very nicely & are well made. Perfect for a spoiled & loved pup.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but doggo hates it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old doggo (Sydney) when we were going hiking in Big Bear, CA. She hated it. That being said, this was her first sweater she ever wore. It’s cute, fit snugly kept her warm, no rashes or any skin problems from the fabric. I would purchase again, but she was very unenthusiastic about it. (As evidenced by her face)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Young

customer_reviews.title: Purple is in
customer_reviews.text: Love the softness snd quality of the material. The color is rich in purple
customer_reviews.author: Erika S. Mason

customer_reviews.title: My Puppy Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! It’s so warm and easy to slip on. My puppy rarely sits in one place for long periods of time but she sits so I can put her sweater on because she loves it! And the pink is a really soft color and not a sharp hot pink. Would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Winny

customer_reviews.title: the best doggy sweater!
customer_reviews.text: bought several of these in assorted colors, fit is great, no shrinkage, my pup cant destroy them if he scratches himself...which is why i bought them. his itching issue is almost fixed [thanks to omega oil] but he's so cute i'll keep him dressed in the winter months. i get lots of compliments. a bit pricey but the sweaters will not shrink, so he can wear them for a LONG time. will def! buy again
customer_reviews.author: redwagon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in Pink!
customer_reviews.text: Lady Raven thinks she’s all that in her new pink sweater. She is a ten pound pup and this size is a perfect fit. I did roll the sleeves up because she her legs aren’t that long. Either way it’s a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi L. Hendry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I love how thick the material is, it will definetly keep my dog warm this winter. She is a chihuahua that weighs 3lbs bought the smallest size, #08. It fits her really well. I love it and I will come back to this brand when she outgrows the sweater.
customer_reviews.author: D&B

customer_reviews.title: Soft and vibrant on my shihpoo
customer_reviews.text: This was sized well. Was soft and easy to put on. And I love the vibrant color as it now makes my brown dog in brown leaves show out!
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Relieved
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think I’d find anything to fit my little 3.5lb Morkie but this one did. #8 size was a little loose but she doesn’t walk out of it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ressa

customer_reviews.title: More than cute
customer_reviews.text: This dog sweater has good coverage. I was looking for a sweater that may help to keep my dog warm. This sweater seems to be cute and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: The sizing and color are spot on
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8 lb Chihuahua mix that has an odd body shape so he's hard to fit but this has just enough stretch to fit his wide chest. It's well made and the tan color is as pictured. It's medium weight so he can wear it in a wider range of temps. Best yet is that he's comfortable in it and doesn't struggle getting in and out. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This sweater looks adorable on my dog, I get complements all the time, and it keeps her little neck warm on cold days
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Sweaters repeat customer!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sweaters! I bought one for my Havi, one for my little foster girl, and now one for our new large pup. Only thing is I wish the halter hole was larger. I ripped two sweaters trying to get the leash attached to the halter rings that were bigger than the hole. Still love the sweater anyway. Washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Love the design and quality. TOO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dog sweaters of all time. I love the turtleneck and the legs. He loves the warmth: just right. I get the size 10 for my 20lb Brussels Griffon, who has a "puppy cut". If your dog is more furry, I'd recommend a size bigger. Expect a LOT of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Lin G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my princess
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little pink sweater for my little fur baby. My dog looks adorable in this sweater and it’s a perfect fit. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Toni D

customer_reviews.title: Studious
customer_reviews.text: If you want your dog to look studious and funny - this turtleneck does the trick. As for warmth... meh. But totally studious.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight warmth somewhat okay quality do not expect to stay as when first purchased
customer_reviews.text: Perfect keep li small dog comfortable during fall and early winter. Extremely stylish the fabric is not as durable but still works.
customer_reviews.author: Mely

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made sweater of soft, comfortable cable-knit yarn. True to size listed. Fits very well and is comfortable to play or sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sweater my dog is comfortable in.
customer_reviews.text: Great warm sweater. My dog absolutely hates them normally but he gets really cold and the only way I know if he likes it is he will run fast in it. Well...he’s been running everywhere and it seems super comfortable on him. The sizing was accurate I got a 13 — my dogs girth is 18 and neck is 12 about 8.5lbs. Great find thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Outback19

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater for my Maltese/shitzu mix male!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality. Colors are vibrant and the fit is true to their charts. Would not hesitate to buy more in other colors! And the price is very reasonable as well.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and  warm
customer_reviews.text: Fits my furry girl great. Love the sleeves, they keep her thin legs warm. Washed well and is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Mya Gives Her New Sweater a Paws Up!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully mint green color that fit her perfectly so I don’t have to see her cold after her grooming.
customer_reviews.author: Rosies50

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: needs more length from neck to the arms. Serves the purpose of keeping my little dog warm
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sweater!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love My Sweater. My human purchased size 12 blue. Received within 2 days. Fits perfectly and for male furries no accidents on potty walks. Material is no cheap nice and soft. Washed 3 times and same as day one. Love sweater so much my human purchased another teal. I really wanted purple but all sold out in my size. Will definitely order more to have in my doggy closet. Thanks. Prince Rogers Chihuahua
customer_reviews.author: BarbieGirl59

customer_reviews.title: So CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: Cutie patootie! I have a 10ish lb chihuahua and this fits her perfectly!!@
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Best dog sweater I own !
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is beyond cute. Fits great. Is super toasty and so comfortable. Many ,many dog clothes I've bought pull and are not made well. This has no rubbing seams or tight areas. My dog was so comfortable and I felt so good leaving him in it all day while I was at work during this cold winter. My absolute favorite item I own for my little Chihuahua mix I will definitely buy more of these products !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hammond

customer_reviews.title: Love these sweaters
customer_reviews.text: These sweaters look great and nice having the sleeves especially when walking when raining or snowing.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Very uptown
customer_reviews.text: Ez to put on washes great. Looks expensive on lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Markann Long

customer_reviews.title: Quality and darling dog sweater
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little sweater in an XS for my 6Lb. Yorkie. It fits her well and she looks darling in it. It is nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark1068

customer_reviews.title: The neck runs small. I have a 5 lb Yorkie and the small size had a neck that was to confining.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really pretty color and leaves plenty of room for females pups to pee.
customer_reviews.author: Hawl2

customer_reviews.title: Designer Pet Clothes
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sweater but I only gave it three stars as it is a little on the thin side and the turtle neck is a too long even turned down. This company has a much heavier sweater that I bought that has a notched color and is much heavier for our northern winters. If you have a little dog with a log neck, this sweater will be fine. If you want a good sweater from this company, look for the ones with a notched collar.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Engel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Soft and warm. It does shrink a little after washing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer m

customer_reviews.title: It’s soft and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The 10” fits our Chihuahua-Rat Terrier mix, Chichi, perfectly. It’s soft and doesn’t pill like some sweaters do. Plus, a dog in a turtleneck? Frickin’ hilarious 😄 I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Acala Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run a bit small so I ordered a medium for my 7 pound chihuahua and it fit perfectly with a little room to spare. Color is really pretty and looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea but my dog didn't think so
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but my dog didn't do much. He's not like my other dog who loved wearing a sweater on the cold. I guess she felt restricted as week as sad to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color off but cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Color TOTALL OFF, not eveeeeen close to photo lol, but it’s high quality and CUTE! Photo attached, judge for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Does not wash well and opening for leash or harness connection frays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is great! So well made, so cute and looks great on my poodle! I'm ironing a turkey patch on it for him to wear Thanksgiving Day. The patch I bought is "THANKSGIVING TURKEY (Large) - Iron On Embroidered Applique-Holidays Food Sold by: Lois Designs ."
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is so cute, fits perfect and is great quality. I also love the hole in the backside to allow the leash pull through ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Ms A

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness these are great! My furbabies love them, and they fit them perfectly. I have two Yorkies, one right under 5 lbs. and one right under 6 lbs., and the XS is perfection on both. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jdw's mom

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness these are great! My furbabies love them, and they fit them perfectly. I have two Yorkies, one right under 5 lbs. and one right under 6 lbs., and the XS is perfection on both. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jdw's mom

customer_reviews.title: The best dog sweater on line
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this company’s products. The sizing is perfect and the material is soft and high quality. I & my puppy get so much compliments when she has the sweater on.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnielass

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is made very well, and it fit our little boy just right. I ordered 2 different colors dark green and a light camel color. I have purchased sweaters from a different designer, and I have to say that these are equally as nice, AND these sweaters were 1/2 as expensive!!!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sweater. The small fits my mini schnauzer perfectly. The purple matches her LSU colar perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: H Chenevert

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater this brand is a good one for my dog, size is accurate and fits very good, looks cute
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is great for my Yorkie! The size #10 fits her perfectly. It keeps her warm and looks so cute! I always get compliments when we go out. I have both the beige/tan color and the olive green! Love them both on her.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: I ordered by the size chart and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered by the size chart and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Turtleneck?
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sweater. Its not too heavy which is what I was looking for but I think it would be much more comfortable without the turtleneck. My little guy seems bothered by the thickness around his neck.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS B

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Premium quality. Does not pile like other brands. Will purchase again and recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable dog sweater
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems happy in this sweater. She looks very adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Robin5098

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sweater
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material and soft and the size fit perfectly for my Pom. Wash it few time with warm water it has no problem. I ordered small size for my 10-11 lbs pup.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: warm
customer_reviews.text: this is the one she wears most of the time
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gouin

product_meta.title: Stinky G Turtleneck Dog Sweater
product_meta.description:
Size:#12| Color:MintAdorable dog sweater, a luxurious essential for the well-appointed pup.

Crafted in a combination of Wide-ribbed turtleneck collar and Aran stitches for a heritage look.

Machine wash cold.
feature_bullets: Recommend for dog weighs 9 - 14 lbs, Neck girth 12" - 14", Chest girth 16" - 19"
Easy to put on and take off
